page.shortlink: api objects query object records get function
page.description: The .RECORDS_GET() method retrieves the Number_of_Records selected by the query list.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "D" qry = tbl.query_create() ? qry.records_get() = 6
